Samosa ka atta / dough ke liye : Maida - 2 1/2 Cup / 300g Oil - 3 Tbsp / 45-50 ml Pani - atta lagane ke liye Namak : to taste Ajwain - 1/2 tsp"

"Chopped vegetables like capsicum ( 1/2), Onion (1), Tomato (1). ( You can add any toppings of your choice) Boiled corns (1/2 Cup) Butter Bread (2 slices) Mayonnaise ( easily available at grocery shops) Pizza Sauce ( easily available at grocery shops) Mozzarella Cheese Black Pepper Chilly Flakes Oregano "

"All purpose flour - 160 grams Maize flour - 160 grams Turmeric - 1/4 teaspoon Black pepper - 1/2 teaspoon Green chili - 1 1/2 tablespoons Salt - 1 teaspoon Oil - 2 tablespoons (divided) Butter - 2 tablespoons Water - 70 millilitres Green chili - 1 1/2 tablespoons Boiled potatoes - 350 grams Boiled corn - 150 grams Salt - 1/2 teaspoon Sugar - 1/2 teaspoon Lemon juice - 1 tablespoon Pizza n pasta sauce - 80 grams Mayonnaise - 2 tablespoons Cabbage - 30 grams Tomato - 50 grams Onions - 30 grams Bell pepper - 50 grams Salt - 1/2 teaspoon Lemon juice - 1 tablespoon"

" 1 Cup Maida or Plain Flour (take out 1 tbs maida) 2 tbsp cocoa powder 1 tsp baking powder 1/2 tsp baking soda 1 tsp vanilla essence 1 tsp vinegar 1/4th cup odourless oil (80 gm butter) 1/2 cup castor sugar (normal sugar churned in mixie) 1/2 cup milk 1/2 cup curd Place butter paper in the pan Grease the pan Salt layer in the cooking pan for equal hit Cover pan lid with clothing to avoid water dripping in cake On gas flame, 10 min preheat, slow flame, 35-40 minutes baking 150 gm dark chocolate melted and 150 gm milk compound melted Add 1/2 tsp milk in melted chocolate so the chocolate does'nt get set Chocolate shave The chocolate melted on bubble wraps and set for decorating the cake"

"Flour 1/2 cup Salt 1/4 tsp Baking powder 1/2 tsp Baking soda 1/2 tsp Sugar 1 tsp Curd 3 tbsp (add more if needed) Oil 1 tbsp Knead for 5 mins Soft and smooth dough Let it rest for 15 mins Butter 2 tbsp Garlic 2-3 cloves (finely chopped) Coriander 2 tsp Salt Black pepper Chili flakes Mix herbs Mozzarella cheese Seal the edges very well Chili flakes Mix herbs Place a stand and heat the pan for 5 mins on medium flame After 5 mins place the baking tray Cook it on low flame for 25 - 35 mins or bake in a preheated oven at 180c for 20 - 30 mins"

"Maize flour- 1 cup Maida- 1/2 cup Turmeric Powder- 1/2 tsp salt to taste Oregano- 1/2 tsp oil- 2 tbsp water to knead
sufficient oil to fry."

" DOUGH: 1 cup all purpose flour/maida 1/2 cup whole wheat flour Salt 1 tbsp oil Water to knead
FRANKIE MASALA: 2 tsp red chilly powder 1 tsp garam masala 1 tsp cumin powder 1 tsp coriander powder 2 tsp dry mango powder 1/2 tsp black pepper powder 1/4 tsp salt little black salt
MASALA: 1 tbsp oil 1 tsp jeera 2 green chillies 1 onion into slices 2 tsp ginger garlic 2 tomatoes chopped/pureed Salt 1 tsp red chilly powder 1 tsp coriander powder 2 tbsp tomato sauce 1 tbsp schezwan sauce 200 gms Paneer 1 capsicum some cabbage Fresh coriander"

"MOMO: Cabbage - 1 Small (grated) Ginger - 2 inch piece (grated) Green Chili - 1 (chopped) Onion - 1 large(chopped) Capsicum - 1 large(chopped) Black pepper - 1 tsp Carrot - 1 small (grated) Salt and Pepper - to season Oil - 1 tsp Maida / Flour - 1 cup Salt - to season Oil - 1 tsp Water - as req.
